text: Anyone using Python for embedded projects?
My company is using Python for a relatively simple embedded project.
Is anyone else out there using Python on embedded platforms?
Overall it's working well for us, quick to develop apps, quick to debug.
I like the overall "conciseness" of the language.
The only real problem I have in day to day work is that the lack of static checking vs a regular compiler can cause problems to be thrown at run-time, e.g.
a simple accidental cat of a string and an int in a print statement can bring the whole application down.
